title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories on the x axis representing Mobile Carrier, and Market share in each Mobile Carrier on the y axis.
The highest category is found at BT (including EE) where Market share is 28.0.
The lowest category is found at Talk Talk where Market share is 1.0.
The highest value at BT (including EE) is almost 28.0 times larger than the minimum value of Talk Talk.
The highest value at BT (including EE) is almost 28.0 times larger than the minimum value of Talk Talk.
The difference between the max Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) and min Mobile Carrier Talk Talk is 27.0.
